name: Halls
description: Main corridor linking the building's primary entrances.

name: The Spoke
description: Campus pub and eatery serving food, coffee, and snacks.

name: Centre Spot
description: Central food court with a rotating mix of vendors.

name: Jugo Juice
description: Smoothies, juices, and light bites for a quick refresh.

name: Subway
description: Sandwich shop offering customizable subs and salads.

name: Bento Sushi
description: Grab-and-go sushi, maki rolls, and Japanese-inspired meals.

name: Mustang Lounge East
description: Event lounge hosting student programming and gatherings.

name: Mustang Lounge West
description: Flexible lounge space for performances, markets, and clubs.

name: UCC 144
description: Multi-purpose room used for meetings and study sessions.

name: UCC 146 Classroom
description: Lecture-style classroom equipped with AV and tiered seating.

name: UCC 147A Classroom
description: Seminar room suited for smaller classes and workshops.

name: UCC 147B Classroom
description: Collaborative classroom with movable seating and whiteboards.

name: UCC 149
description: Classroom space used for lectures, exams, and training sessions.

name: Elevators
description: Elevator bank providing access to all public floors.

name: Bathrooms
description: Public washrooms with accessible stalls and baby changing.
